• Unpasteurised milk. Drink 
only pasteurised or UHT  
milk which has been 
pasteurised. If only raw milk 
is	available,	boil	it	first.	Don’t	
drink unpasteurised goats’ 
or sheep’s milk or eat certain 
food that is made out of 
them, such as soft goats’ 
cheese.
Vitamins and minerals
